    @allure.title("Validate the absent on Protocol Microbial Endotoxin residue verification when select zero in "
                  "microbial policy for room grade swab samples for split")
    @allure.description("This test case tests API to Validate the absent on Protocol Microbial Endotoxin residue "
                        "verification when select zero in microbial policy for room grade swab samples for split")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cuw0mqd")
    @pytest.mark.formulation
    @pytest.mark.max
    @pytest.mark.microbial_endotoxin_protocol_swab_absent_zero_split_room_grade
    def test_microbial_endotoxin_protocol_swab_absent_zero_split_room_grade(self):
        microbial_data = {}
        microbial_data.update(self.DEFAULT_SURFACE_AREA_SQCM)
        surface_unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(microbial_data)["response"]
        surface_unit = json.loads(surface_unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if surface_unit != "sqcm":
            self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(microbial_data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        microbial_data.update(self.DEFAULT_VOLUME_ML)
        volume_unit = self.update_default_unit.test_get_default_unit(microbial_data)["response"]
        volume_unit = json.loads(volume_unit)["default_units"]["unit"]
    
        if volume_unit != "ml":
            self.update_default_unit.test_update_default_unit(microbial_data)
            self.change_assessment.test_start_cleaning_assessment(scenario=True)
            self.change_assessment.test_submit_approve_cleaning_assessment()
    
        policy = self.policy_microbial.test_get_microbial_cleaning_limits_policy()["response"]
        policy = json.loads(policy)["result"]
    
        limit_data = {"default_endo": 0, "un_endo_value": 0, "grade_bacterial_limit": 0, "grade_fungal_limit": 0,
                      "limit_type": "swab", "grade": True, "grade_id": self.protocol_common_method.ROOM_GRADE_ID}
    
        payload = create_cleaning_limit_policy_microbial(policy, {"splitBacteriaAndFungi": True,
                                                                  "default_unit": volume_unit,
                                                                  "surface_area_unit": surface_unit},
                                                         limit_data=limit_data)
    
        endotoxin_data = {}
        endotoxin_data.update({"update_policy_payload": payload})
>       microbial_policy_update = self.policy_microbial.test_update_microbial_cleaning_limits_policy(endotoxin_data)[
